inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient states she can give informed consent

inclusion.criterion: Physically and neurologically healthy [confirmed by a comprehensive medical history]
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: clinically significant medical or neurologic condition or neurocognitive dysfunction
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: that would affect function and/or task performance and/or interfere with the study protocol
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: any current (or within past 2 months) medical condition requiring medication that would interact with dronabinol or interfere with the study protocol
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of current medical conditions

exclusion.criterion: risk of harm to self or others that requires immediate intervention
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: presence of contraindications, current or past allergic or adverse reaction, or known sensitivity to cannabinoid-like substances (dronabinol/marijuana/cannabis/THC, cannabinoid oil, sesame oil, gelatin, glycerin, and titanium dioxide)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: positive drug screen or alcohol breathalyzer
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: unwilling/unable to sign informed consent document
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: patient states she can give informed consent

exclusion.criterion: currently pregnant (positive pregnancy test), planning pregnancy, or lactating (women)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: under 18 or over 50 years of age
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: traumatic brain injury (as defined by The American Congress of Rehabilitation as a person who has had a traumatically induced physiological disruption of brain function)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: inability to tolerate small, enclosed spaces without anxiety (e.g. claustrophobia), as determined by self-report and/or a preliminary session in a mock scanner
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has persistent feelings of sadness and loss of interest in daily activities. She is on anti-depressants for the past 6 months, but the symptoms are still present.
